item.title: Cant get special attacks working got 1 error
item.dc:creator: @propabad propabad
item.description:
@propabad wrote:

how do i fix this error

client.java:23780: unreachable statement break; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error

and tell me if any of this need editing

[code]public void checkSpec() { // specs - by Danie B
if (spec == 0)
{
specbar = “@red@[–SPECIALATTACK–]”;
}
if (spec == 1)
{
specbar = “@gre@[@red@–SPECIALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 2)
{
specbar = “@gre@[-@red@-SPECIALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 3)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–@red@SPECIALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 4)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–S@red@PECIALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 5)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SP@red@ECIALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 6)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPE@red@CIALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 7)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPEC@red@IALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 8)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECI@red@ALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 9)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIA@red@LATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 10)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIAL@red@ATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 11)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALA@red@TTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 12)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALAT@red@TACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 13)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATT@red@ACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 14)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATTA@red@CKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 15)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATTAC@red@KS–]”;
}
if (spec == 16)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATTACK@red@S–]”;
}
if (spec == 17)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATTACKS@red@–]”;
}
if (spec == 18)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATTACKS-@red@-]”;
}
if (spec == 19)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATTACKS–@red@]”;
}
if (spec == 20)
{
specbar = “@gre@}[–SPECIALATTACKS–]”;
}

} // specs[/code]

public String specBar = "@gre@[--SPECIALATTACKS--]@gre@"; // specs public int spec = 20; // specs public int specTimer = 0; // specs

if (specTimer < 60) { // specs - by Jorsa specTimer += 1; // specs - by Jorsa } if (specTimer >= (60 - (playerLevel[playerMagic] / 2)) && spec < 10) { // specs - by Jorsa spec += 1; // specs - by Jorsa specTimer = 0; // specs - by Jorsa } checkSpec();

[code]case 163: // dbaxe spec
sendQuest(“db-axe”, 173);
DragonBattleAxe();
break;
case 167: // d long
sendQuest(“DLong”, 179);
DragonLongSpecial();
break;
case 172: // whip emote
sendQuest(“Whip”, 187);
sendQuest(“Whip”, 181);

					WhipSpecial();
					break;
				
                                    case 166: // dance emote
					sendQuest("DScim", 178);
					DragonScimmy();
					break;
			        case 52050: // panic emote
					sendQuest("D dag", 13371);
					DragonDagger();
					break;
			        case 52051: // jig emote
					sendQuest("D mace", 13372);
					DragonMace();
					break;
			        case 52052: // spin emote
					sendQuest("DHally", 13373);
					DragonHally();
					break;

break;
[/code]

sendFrame126("DLong", 179); sendFrame126("Whip", 187); sendFrame126("D-Sc", 176); sendFrame126("Dbax", 173); sendFrame126("DMac", 13372); sendFrame126("DHal", 13373); sendFrame126("DDag", 13371);
